EmailTemplate.description: This is the email that will go out when the "Talk to us" form is submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Talk to us
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for taking the time to contact MBO Partners. My name is {{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} {{lead.EM LName:default=Arhancet}}, an MBO Partners Enrollment Manager, and I will reach out to you within one business day.
If you prefer, you can easily schedule a phone appointment with me by visiting {{lead.EM TTLink:default=https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC}}.
I look forward to speaking with you!
Best regards,
{{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} ___________________________________ {{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} {{lead.EM LName:default=Arhancet}} {{lead.Lead Owner Job Title:default=Enrollment Manager}} MBO Partners
t: {{lead.Lead Owner Phone Number:default=703-793-6011} f: 703.793.6070 e: {{lead.EM Email:default=SArhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
